title: My pc restarts after starting a normal game
body:
So basically, every time I start a normal match, the loading screen starts, and then my PC restarts, which usually results in a remake and a queue timer.
Is there any way to fix this, and is the problem with my PC or League, 
I don't experience this in any other game, or at any other occasion.
Thanks in advance

replies.body: Your computer shutting off and starting like that could suggest hardware failure, and can end up damaging your PC.  The first thing I suggest here is double check your air vents to make sure there's solid airflow, as the restarts might be due to overheating.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, so our tech team can take a look with you and see what's up.  See you there!

Okay, firstly I will dust my PC and see if the crashing stops,
Also it only happens in normals (Summoners rift), Not the rotational game-modes
But i will discuss this more with the support team, 
Thanks for your assistance, have a great day.
